name: multiheck.exe
description:
A simple platformer/shooter with waves of enemies and destructible terrain.

Create a server to start, or join by IP. You'll probably need to port forward.

WASD controls, space to select in menus. space to fire weapon. E to change weapon. R to (re)spawn.

Made to experiment with the GameMaker: Studio multiplayer and networking functions.

Follow me on twitter @GamesOnVideo
